Title: Image Viewer (wpf version)
Description: Image viewer helps windows users to review images on their computer. It is written i Csharp and wpf.
HomeWiki:
Image viewer helps windows users to review images on their computer. It is written i Csharp and wpf.

Features :

-Diaporama, with ajustable speed.
-Drag and drop image files from browser.
-Image re-ordering in the thumbnail panel via drag and drop
-support jpeg , gif , bmp , png and tiff.
